akn:section.akn:heading: Determination of commodity value for set-aside

akn:content.akn:p: § 1742. Determination of commodity value for set-aside Quantities of commodities shall not be included in the commodity set-aside which have an aggregate value in excess of $2,500,000,000. The value of the commodities placed in the commodity set-aside, for the purpose of this section, shall be the Corporation’s investment in such commodities as of the date they are included in the commodity set-aside, as determined by the Secretary. (Aug. 28, 1954, ch. 1041, title I, § 102, 68 Stat. 897.)
